item.title: Open Policy Agent (OPA) Integration
item.description: ⚠️ Preview Feature OPA integration is currently an preview feature and may undergo breaking changes in future versions. Use with caution in production environments. This page describes how to integrate Apache Polaris (Incubating) with Open Policy Agent (OPA) for external authorization. Overview Open Policy Agent (OPA) is a general-purpose policy engine that enables unified, context-aware policy enforcement across your stack. OPA provides a high-level declarative language (Rego) for authoring policies and APIs to offload policy decision-making from your software.
